snippet: The BBC says many of the claims made by a central witness in the case cannot be confirmed with public records.
abstract: Investigation into alleged pedophile ring among some of Great Britain's highest-ranking political, government and military figures has been upended by doubts surrounding credibility of witness known by pseudonym Nick; some have questioned witness's claims that he was abused by Westminster VIP ring for nine years and witnessed three murders, and now BBC, after extensive research, has raised its own concerns about credibility of accounts.
lead_paragraph: The BBC says many of the claims made by a central witness in the case cannot be confirmed with public records.

headline.main: BBC Casts Doubt on Claims of British Pedophile Ring
headline.print_headline: BBC Casts Doubt on Witness in Abuse Case
